highest_positive_comment: [Master] I asked Deandre Ayton why he wore Nike shoes instead of Puma for the 2nd straight game. They’re ironing out kinks w/his shoe size. “I wear size 18. What we’re trying to do is make the best shoe possible. [The Suns] want me to perform well. That’s why I’m wearing those right now”
lowest_negative_comment: Zion breaks his shoe and suffers a knee injury
